title: Food preservation
creator_credit: Hugh Hudson, Unilever Films and Cammell Hudson
brief_description: Discusses modern developments in food preservation, including quick-freezing and canning. Also shows by animation and microphotography the growth and decay of cells, and the effect of bacterial action in the cell breakdown.
creator_credit_for_label: Hugh Hudson, Unilever Films and Cammell Hudson
